name: @ranchonyx/ini-parser
description: A simple, relatively lightweight ini parser

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run uglify
scripts.clean: npm run clean:win && npm run clean:lin
scripts.clean:win: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') process.exit(1)" || , if exist dist del dist\* /S /Q && if exist build del build\* /S /Q
scripts.gitpub: node -e "process.stdout.write(new Date().toISOString())" > tmp && set /p timestamp= < tmp && del tmp && git add . && git commit -m "BUILD: %timestamp%"

author: Felix Janetzki
